title: Sad how everyone hates yasuo
body: I personally LOVE going against yasuos. (I never played him before, except the time it was one for all and i was forced too) but honestly. hes not that bad to play against. feel bad for the mains out there. dont worry guys, i love facing you :) regardless what happens.

replies.body:
We hate Yasuo because....

Enemy Yasuo

http://giphy.com/gifs/samurai-jack-and-the-scotsman-pt-ii-celtic-demons-1hmAtjckfZ5IY

Ally yasuo

http://giphy.com/gifs/samurai-jack-aku-master-trolling-t9rcXdCpBmqti

I just hate him because he's so damn obnoxious, always being flashy and shrieking and dashing all around. Plus his mains are the most like to do crap like flashing mastery emotes after collapsing 4v1 onto a Soraka.

I lust play {{champion:50}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:127}} into him and dumpster his ass, but that doesn't stop him from just rushing {{item:3086}} and proceeding to act like me making him 0/5 at 12 minutes never even happened, and he is in fact 3/0 despite the scoreboard telling me otherwise.

The reason some people hate yasuo isn't because his abilities are bs, but they do so much damage on such a low cooldown. Nowone likes being chunked to half health from a q tornado, or dying in 3 autos once he gets 1 crit item or, getting ulted under your tower and having him still get away. Also the mobility counters some champs, but the mobility is kinda healthy
Everyone hates Yasuos because once he gets{{item:3046}} he can 1v1 anyone in the damn game and is extremely broke.
The only time i like playing vs yasuo is when im {{champion:30}} (:<

I can play Viktor well enough to deal with him.

The hyper aggro ones at lvl 1 are my favorite.
the only time I like going against yasuo is when i'm playing mordekaiser CX
Me too. Largely because a lot of them aren't that great. Also i understand how to counter him.
